Name: HTTP - Test URL
Description: Makes a GET request to a HTTP(S) end point and verifies that a particular status code and response (optional) is returned within a specified period of time
Author: HumanPrinter

Parameters.Name: Uri
Parameters.Label: URI
Parameters.HelpText: The full Uri of the endpoint

Parameters.Name: CustomHostHeader
Parameters.Label: Custom HOST header
Parameters.HelpText: An optional custom HOST header which will be passed with the request

Parameters.Name: TimeoutSeconds
Parameters.Label: Timeout (Seconds)
Parameters.HelpText: The number of seconds before the step fails and times out

Parameters.Name: AuthUsername
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: Username for authentication. Leave blank to use Anonymous.

Parameters.Name: AuthPassword
Parameters.Label: Password
Parameters.HelpText: Password for authentication. Leave blank for Anonymous.

Parameters.Name: UseWindowsAuth
Parameters.Label: Use Windows Authentication
Parameters.HelpText: Should the request be made passing windows authentication (kerberos) credentials otherwise uses basic authentication

Parameters.Name: ExpectedResponse
Parameters.Label: Expected Response
Parameters.HelpText: The response should be this text
